course.title: Sports and Society
course.description: This course will examine the institution of sports and how it is shaped by society. Is sports a level playing field and meritocracy where the best person or team wins? Or is sports a mirror of an unequal society where power and wealth shape social life? How do class, race and gender shape the sports we play and how we play them? We will consider sports and higher education in the U.S. and at Harvard. We will also look at youth sports, sports as a business, the media and sports, and sports and health. Students will do an in depth research project on the topic and will actively discuss readings in class each week.
